Scripts.OnShow: if (AuctionFrame and AuctionFrame:IsShown()) then Atr_Mask:Show(); end;
Scripts.OnHide: if (AuctionFrame and AuctionFrame:IsShown()) then Atr_Mask:Hide(); end; if (InterfaceOptionsFrame and InterfaceOptionsFrame:IsShown()) then Atr_Mask_StdOptions:Hide(); end;

Scripts.OnLoad: ATR_tipsAuctionOpt_CB_Text:SetText (ZT("Show auction house prices in tooltips"));
